plugins.name: Mavity Figma Plugin
plugins.description: The plugin is a tailored tool designed to convert web pages into Figma designs with specific adjustments for seamless integration with Mavity. It works by using a Chrome extension to extract the structure and elements of a web page, converting them into a JSON format. This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
plugins.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

113549.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

plugins.name: AntiSpacer
plugins.description:
Start the plugin and press the button to apply it to each text node in project


Sometimes there are many extra spaces in text. Even if not, it's better to be sure that there are none of them, especially if removing them takes only one click!
plugins.tagline: This plugin allows you to remove extra spaces in the whole document in one click!

plugins.name: Superduper Maps
plugins.description:
Superduper Maps brings real, interactive maps directly into your Figma designs. No more static screenshots or placeholder rectangles—insert dynamic, customizable maps with a single click. Pan, zoom, and explore in real-time, then export crisp, production-ready maps at any resolution. With 3D camera controls, custom styling options, and frame-perfect sizing, you can create stunning location-based designs that match your exact vision.


Core Features


🗺️ Interactive Map Preview

  1. Live canvas with real-time pan and zoom
  2. Smooth, responsive map exploration before inserting
  3. Instant visual feedback for all adjustments


📍 Precision Location Control

  1. Search any location worldwide with integrated geocoding
  2. Fine-tune latitude, longitude, and zoom levels
  3. One-click reset to default view


🎨 Professional Map Styles

  1. Access to 8+ premium map themes (Streets, Outdoors, Light, Dark, Satellite, Navigation)
  2. Import and save custom styles for brand consistency
  3. Real-time style switching and preview


📐 Advanced Camera Controls

  1. 3D perspective with adjustable bearing (0-360°) and tilt (0-60°)
  2. Create dramatic map angles and cinematic views
  3. Perfect for hero sections and showcase designs


⚡ Smart Frame Integration

  1. Automatically detects selected Figma frames
  2. Maps adapt perfectly to your frame dimensions
  3. Frame-perfect sizing every time


🖼️ High-Quality Export

  1. Export at 1x for web or 2x for retina displays
  2. Up to 4000x4000px export capability
  3. Consistent geographic coverage that matches preview


🚀 Performance Optimised

  1. Intelligent tile caching for faster loading
  2. Offline support for previously viewed areas
  3. Built specifically for Figma's architecture


Superduper Maps Pro

  1. 50 daily exports (vs 5 lifetime on free tier)
  2. Unlimited usage with your own Mapbox API key
  3. Cancel anytime - no long-term commitments


Coming Soon

  1. Google Maps integration
  2. OpenStreetMap support
plugins.tagline: Maps for Figma, super fast, super good

plugins.name: Variable Linter
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that helps analyze, audit, and replace variables in your Figma designs. Scan selected layers for bound variables, categorize them by source, and efficiently replace variables with those from approved collections.


Features


🔍 Variable Analysis


Deep Scanning: Analyzes nested components, variants, and instances

Source Categorization: Identifies variables as local, team library, or orphaned

Type-Safe Analysis: Categorizes variables by type (color, number, string, boolean)

Real-time Results: Instant scanning of selected layers


📊 Variable Management


Approval System: Mark specific variable collections as approved replacement sources

Bulk Operations: Replace multiple variables of the same type simultaneously

Individual Replacement: Replace variables one at a time with precise control

Orphan Detection: Identifies variables that no longer exist in their collections


🎯 Smart Filtering


Toggle Views: Switch between all variables and unapproved variables only

Sortable Tables: Sort by name, type, value, or source

Search & Filter: Find specific variables quickly


📋 Team Library Integration


Library Detection: Automatically identifies team libraries and shared collections

Permission Management: Configure which collections can be used as replacement sources

Compatibility Checking: Ensures replacement variables match original types
plugins.tagline: Scans for variables in a selection and reports the source(s) of those variables.

plugins.name: Magic Todo
plugins.description:
Magic Todo lets you organize and track your to-dos without leaving Figma.


✅Tasks Tab (available now): create and rename folders, add & remove tasks, check tasks off to move them into your Completed list, and restore with one click. Everything is saved between sessions.


✨Magic Tasks Tab (coming soon): type or paste free-form requirements and click “Generate Magic Tasks” to have AI instantly spin up a new folder full of actionable tasks.


Use Magic Todo today to keep your design work on track—and watch for our AI-powered task generator in the next release.
plugins.tagline: Folder‐based task manager in Figma (Magic Tasks coming soon)

138503.name: Magic Todo
138503.description:
Magic Todo lets you organize and track your to-dos without leaving Figma.


✅Tasks Tab (available now): create and rename folders, add & remove tasks, check tasks off to move them into your Completed list, and restore with one click. Everything is saved between sessions.


✨Magic Tasks Tab (coming soon): type or paste free-form requirements and click “Generate Magic Tasks” to have AI instantly spin up a new folder full of actionable tasks.


Use Magic Todo today to keep your design work on track—and watch for our AI-powered task generator in the next release.
138503.tagline: Folder‐based task manager in Figma (Magic Tasks coming soon)

plugins.name: Bulk Text Replacer
plugins.description:
CSV形式のファイルを読み込んで一括置換できます。

1列目に検索対象、2列目に置換内容を記述したCSVファイルを読み込ませて使用して下さい。


手入力で「検索する言葉」と「置換する言葉」の間に「=>」を入れることでも可能です。

例：検索する言葉 => 置換する言葉


You can perform bulk text replacement by importing a CSV file.

The first column should contain the text to search for, and the second column should contain the replacement text.


Alternatively, you can manually enter replacement pairs using the => format.

Example: original text => replacement text
plugins.tagline: Bulk text replacement for Figma, Figjam & Slides.

137797.name: Bulk Text Replacer
137797.description:
CSV形式のファイルを読み込んで一括置換できます。

例：検索する言葉 => 置換する言葉


You can perform bulk text replacement by importing a CSV file.

The first column should contain the text to search for, and the second column should contain the replacement text.


Alternatively, you can manually enter replacement pairs using the => format.

Example: original text => replacement text
137797.release_notes:
検出されなかったテキストを一覧表示し、CSV形式で書き出せるようにしました。
Unmatched texts can now be viewed in a list and exported as a CSV file.
137797.tagline: Bulk text replacement for Figma, Figjam & Slides.

plugins.name: Swap Dimensions
plugins.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

136052.name: Swap Dimensions
136052.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
136052.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

plugins.name: ぼかし背景ジェネレーター
plugins.description:
# Image Aspect Ratio & Background Blur Generator Plugin


## Overview


This Figma plugin automatically generates a new frame from selected images (or rectangles with image fills),

with a **specified aspect ratio and width, and a blurred background**.


- Useful for creating SNS thumbnails and other aspect-ratio-fixed images

- Supports batch processing of multiple images at once


---


## Main Features


- **Aspect Ratio & Width Customization**

Choose from custom ratios or presets (16:9, 4:3, 1:1, etc.). You can freely specify the width (px).


- **Background Blur Effect**

The original image is enlarged and blurred as the background, with the original image centered. Blur strength and scale are adjustable.


- **Batch Processing**

Select multiple images or rectangles with image fills and generate all at once.


- **Automatic Saving & Restoration of Settings**

Your last-used settings are saved in Figma's clientStorage and automatically restored on next launch.


- **Japanese UI**

Intuitive and easy-to-use Japanese interface.


---


## How to Use


1. **Select images or rectangles with image fills**

Multiple selection is supported.


2. **Launch the plugin**

Set the aspect ratio, width, blur strength, and scale in the UI.


3. **Click the "Create" button**

A new frame with the specified ratio, width, and blurred background will be generated to the right of the selected image(s).


4. **Notification**

Success and error messages are shown at the bottom of the UI with color distinction.


---


## Notes


- Non-image nodes are automatically skipped.

- Settings are saved per Figma file.


---


## Data Security


- This plugin does **not** send any user data, images, or personal information to external servers.

- All settings are stored locally using Figma's `clientStorage` API.

- No external API or server communication is performed.


---


# 背景ブラー＆アスペクト比固定の画像生成プラグイン


## 概要


この Figma プラグインは、選択した画像（または画像 fill を持つ矩形）から、

**指定したアスペクト比・幅で新しいフレームを作成し、背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成**します。


- SNS 用サムネイルやサムネイル画像の自動生成に便利です

- 複数画像を一括で処理できます


---


## 主な機能


- **アスペクト比・幅の指定**

カスタム比率やプリセット（16:9, 4:3, 1:1 など）から選択可能。幅（px）も自由に指定できます。


- **背景ブラー効果**

元画像を拡大・ぼかして背景にし、中央に元画像を配置します。ブラー強度や拡大率も調整可能。


- **複数画像の一括処理**

複数の画像や画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択して一括で生成できます。


- **前回の設定値を自動保存・復元**

設定値は Figma の clientStorage に保存され、次回起動時に自動で復元されます。


- **日本語 UI**

直感的で使いやすい日本語インターフェース。


---


## 使い方


1. **画像または画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択**

複数選択も可能です。


2. **プラグインを起動**

UI でアスペクト比・幅・ブラー強度・拡大率を設定します。


3. **「作成」ボタンをクリック**

選択画像の右隣に、指定した比率・幅・ブラー背景付きの新しいフレームが自動生成されます。


4. **通知**

成功・エラーは画面下部に色分けして表示されます。


---


## 注意点


- 画像以外のノードは自動的にスキップされます。

- 設定値は Figma ファイルごとに保存されます。


---


## データセキュリティ


- 本プラグインはユーザーのデータや画像、個人情報を外部サーバーに一切送信しません。

- 設定値はFigmaの`clientStorage`機能を用いてローカル環境のみに保存されます。

- 外部APIや外部サーバーとの通信は一切行いません。
plugins.tagline: 選択した画像から、指定したアスペクト比・幅で背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成します。

133688.name: ぼかし背景ジェネレーター

plugins.name: Figue
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma workflow with Figue, the AI assistant that understands design.


Analyze frames, generate text variations, create images, and receive expert UI/UX advice through natural conversations.


Whether you need fresh content ideas, design feedback, or visual assets, Figue brings the power of GPT-4o directly into your design process.


Save time, spark creativity, and solve design challenges with an AI partner that speaks your language.
plugins.tagline: Your AI design partner inside Figma, transforming UI/UX workflows through smart conversations.

133084.release_notes: Improvement in language management and small fixes
133084.tagline: Your AI design partner inside Figma, transforming UI/UX workflows through smart conversations.

plugins.name: Disable "Clip content"
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
plugins.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

133693.name: Disable "Clip content"
133693.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
133693.release_notes:
– Improved logging: the path to each modified clipsContent node is now printed in a structured, readable format with icons.
– Skipped clipsContent updates for INSTANCE nodes to avoid errors.
133693.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

plugins.name: SuperLayer (copy)
plugins.description:
SuperLayer (copy) lets you quickly view and copy the names of selected layers in your Figma file or FigJam board. It’s ideal for generating UI inventories, documentation, or simply organizing your layer structure. The plugin also shows each layer’s type and a thumbnail preview when available.


To use it, select one or more layers on your canvas and launch the plugin. A clean list view will appear with sorting options and checkboxes to include or exclude layers. Click the Copy button to copy all selected layer names to your clipboard, formatted line by line. The list updates automatically as you change your selection.


SuperLayer is optimized for speed and simplicity. It does not currently support exporting full metadata, nested hierarchy structures, or annotations. Thumbnails are generated when possible, but may not appear for certain FigJam elements or complex Figma nodes.
plugins.tagline: Copy Figma and FigJam layer names with ease. Sortable and perfect for docs, audits, and checklists

To use it, select one or more layers on your canvas and launch the plugin. A clean list view will appear with sorting options and checkboxes to include or exclude layers. Click the Copy button to copy all selected layer names to your clipboard, formatted line by line. The list updates automatically as you change your selection.


SuperLayer is optimized for speed and simplicity. It does not currently support exporting full metadata, nested hierarchy structures, or annotations. Thumbnails are generated when possible, but may not appear for certain FigJam elements or complex Figma nodes.

plugins.name: Quick Navigator
plugins.description:
Quick Navigator is a lightweight yet powerful plugin designed to help you stay oriented while working on large or complex Figma files. Instead of endlessly zooming and panning around, this plugin gives you a miniature view of your entire canvas thus making it easier than ever to find what you're looking for.


Features:

  1. See all your frames and sections in a simplified, scrollable mini window.
  2. Tap on any visible frame or section in the mini view to instantly select and focus it on the main canvas.
  3. Ideal when you're moving fast, experimenting, or managing chaotic canvases, no need for everything to be clean or structured.


NOTE: Currently, SVG shapes and text layers are not included in the mini view.
plugins.tagline: Never get lost on the canvas again!

plugins.name: Sticky Note Maker
plugins.description:
Sticky Note Maker

Effortlessly add colorful sticky notes to your Figma designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, and organizing ideas.


Key Features:

- Create sticky notes next to any selected frame (top-right) or centered in the viewport.

- Choose from 5 types: Note (blue), Fresh Idea (pink), Approved (green), Need Attention (yellow), Need Fix (red).

- Automatically includes your name and timestamp for easy tracking.

- Simple, icon-driven interface with color-coded hover and selection states.


How to Use:

1. Select a frame (or none for viewport placement).

2. Pick a sticky note type from the icon buttons.

3. Write your note and click "Create".


Ideal for designers, teams, and anyone who loves a visual way to comment and collaborate. Streamline your workflow with Sticky Note Maker!
plugins.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

plugins.name: DATVM
plugins.description:
DATVM makes it simple to inject realistic and varied data directly into your Figma designs, saving you time and keeping your mockups authentic.


100+ Built-in Datasets

Choose from a wide range of pre-populated categories.


Customizable Lists

Create and manage your own custom lists to perfectly match your project's specific needs.


Sort & Randomize

Sort data alphabetically, by length, or randomize for unique content every time.


Number Formatting

Format numbers with precision. Control decimal places, separators, currency symbols, and percentage variations.


Date Formatting

Easily format dates with customizable separators and order.


Bookmarks

Save your favorite lists for quick and easy access.


How it Works

  1. Select the text layers you want to populate.
  2. Open DATVM.
  3. Choose a data category from the available lists or select a custom list.
  4. Customize formatting options.
  5. Click to populate the selected layers with data.
plugins.tagline: Finest Data Populator

122333.description:

plugins.name: Atomic by BigBasket
plugins.description:
Built this to enhance design and development efficiency in BigBasket.


Atomic transforms a single hex code into a complete set of design tokens and themes, instantly applying your brand's unique identity across all your apps and websites. This powerful plugin streamlines multi-brand design systems and campaigns, allowing you to effortlessly generate themes, export developer-ready tokens, and maintain consistency across every product.


Features:


Theme Generator

Define your core brand colors and let Atomic intelligently adjust shades to create a complete palette. You can then export this palette directly to your Figma canvas or instantly generate Figma variables as a complete theme. This helps you create brand modes instantly with proper semantics, enabling faster iterations for brand campaigns and seamless experimentation with colors, fonts, and effects.


Export to JSON

Export all your Figma design tokens directly to JSON, providing developers with a consistent and up-to-date source of truth. This significantly speeds up hand-offs and reduces implementation discrepancies.


Effects

Precise shadow colors and configure them for smoother, more nuanced visual effects. Apply consistent effects across all your brands, updating global styles with ease.


Spacing & Radius

Establish a consistent visual rhythm and hierarchy using dedicated tokens for spacing and border radius. You can use default values or easily adjust them to perfectly align with your brand guidelines.


Neutrals and Semantics

Automatically generates essential primitives and neutral colors. These foundational elements are crucial for building a robust and flexible design system that scales across multiple brands.



Any feedback?

Connect at hello@uxmurali.com

accepted.name: Murali
accepted.description: Product Designer who strives to create meaningful experiences that make people's lives better.

plugins.tagline: Your Brand, Your Styles, Instantly. Just One Click.

plugins.name: Liquid Glass UI
plugins.description:
Liquid Glass UI – Apple-Inspired Glass Effects for Figma


Bring the elegance of Apple’s design language into your UI projects — effortlessly.


Liquid Glass UI is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you apply beautifully crafted glassmorphism styles to any object with just one click. Whether you’re designing an app interface, a website mockup, or a sleek landing page, this plugin gives your elements that polished, high-end glass feel — instantly.



Key Features:


  1. Apple Liquid Glass Effect: Recreate the iconic frosted-glass look seen in iOS 26 and macOS 26 — with precise lighting and softness.


  1. Multiple Glass Styles: Choose from a range of pre-designed styles including Tinted Glass, Clear Glass, Vibrant Glass, and more.


  1. Customizable Properties: Adjust light direction, brightness, blur intensity, and corner radius to match your unique design.


  1. Text & Image Settings: Seamlessly blend or highlight text and images inside or above the glass layer for perfect readability and harmony.


  1. One-Click Application: No more manual layering or tweaking! select your object, click, and you’re done.



Whether you’re aiming for a sleek Apple-style UI, or just want to elevate your design with modern glass effects, Liquid Glass UI is here to make it effortless.


👉 Try it now and give your designs that smooth, sleek, and premium finish — the Apple way.
plugins.tagline: Smooth. Sleek. Apple-Inspired Glass Styles — All With a Single Click

140194.name: Liquid Glass UI
140194.description:

Whether you’re designing an app interface, a website mockup, or a sleek landing page, this plugin gives your elements that polished, high-end glass feel — instantly.



Key Features:


  1. Apple Liquid Glass Effect: Recreate the iconic frosted-glass look seen in iOS 26 and macOS 26 — with precise lighting and softness.


  1. Multiple Glass Styles: Choose from a range of pre-designed styles including Tinted Glass, Clear Glass, Vibrant Glass, and more.


  1. Customizable Properties: Adjust light direction, brightness, blur intensity, and corner radius to match your unique design.


  1. Text & Image Settings: Seamlessly blend or highlight text and images inside or above the glass layer for perfect readability and harmony.


  1. One-Click Application: No more manual layering or tweaking! select your object, click, and you’re done.



Whether you’re aiming for a sleek Apple-style UI, or just want to elevate your design with modern glass effects, Liquid Glass UI is here to make it effortless.


👉 Try it now and give your designs that smooth, sleek, and premium finish — the Apple way.
140194.tagline: Smooth. Sleek. Apple-Inspired Glass Styles — All With a Single Click
